Name: Abandoned Warehouses
Rules Text: You may gain 2 commoditites, or you may convert up to 2 of your commodities to trade goods.
Flavour Text: 1. Far beneath the storm-wracked seas, vast storage tanks drifted in the lightless depths.|2. "Looks like some smuggler hid their shipment of gerr root here and forgot to pick it up."|3. Suffi An drifted into the derelict orbital and brushed her suited hand across the inner hatch controls. A light glowed, and she smiled. The statis seals were still operational.|4. The storage silos had been half buried in sand dunes, sealed enviro-doors hiding the stockpiles within.

Name: Biotic Research Facility
Rules Text: Attach: This planet has a green technology specialty; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.

Name: Core Mine
Rules Text: If you have at least 1 mech on this planet, or if you remove 1 infantry from this planet, gain 1 trade good.
Flavour Text: 1. "If we don't seal it now, this mine is going to erupt and spew those metals you want so badly across the entire continent!"|2. The borehole was over a kilometer across. It seemed to stretch down forever, but Ilan could see a faint orange glow in its depths.|3. Without the proper machinery, a core mine can be a more hostile environment than a star's corona.

Name: Cultural Relic Fragment
Rules Text: Action: Purge 3 of your cultural relic fragments to gain 1 relic.
Aliases: cultural fragment, blue fragment, blue relic fragment

Name: Cybernetic Research Facility
Rules Text: Attach: This planet has a yellow technology specialty; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.

Name: Demilitarized Zone
Rules Text: Return all structures on this planet to your reinforcements. Then, return all ground forces on this planet to the space area.|Attach: Units cannot be committed to, produced on, or placed on this planet. During the agenda phase, this planet's planet card can be traded as part of a transaction.

Name: Derelict Vessel
Rules Text: Draw 1 secret objective.
Flavour Text: 1. Missing for fifty years, the Errasthua was found drifting off the Celder Nebula with her drive dead and every crewmember vanished.|2. The flickering ion storm illuminated the hulk, its hull rent and torn by some monstrous force.

Name: Dyson Sphere
Rules Text: Attach: This planet's resource value is increased by 2 and its influence values is increased by 1.

Name: Enigmatic Device
Rules Text: Place this card faceup in your play area.|Action: You may spend 6 resource and purge this card to research 1 technology.
Flavour Text: 1. A needle longer than a dreadnought but no wider than a landcar flew through the void, its surface glowing with a pale violet light.|2. The silver pinwheel spun slowly in the midst of the nebula, each kilometer-long blade glittering faintly with reflected starlight.

Name: Expedition
Rules Text: If you have at least 1 mech on this planet, or if you remove 1 infantry from this planet, ready this planet.
Flavour Text: 1. The Eidolon screamed through the atmosphere, corrosive rain streaming harmlessly off the hull as it began its survey sweep.|2. "These cave networks stretch for hundreds of kilometers. It may take months to properly map them."|3. "We've lost two companies of scouts to whatever is in those canyons."

Name: Freelancers
Rules Text: You may produce 1 unit in this system; you may spend influence as if it were resources to produce this unit.
Flavour Text: 1. As part of the annexation agreement, local artisans would be well paid to lay the groundwork for military installations in the newly acquired territories.|2. Overseer Klix was known for hiring hundreds of freelancers and then "forgetting" to pay them once the bulk of the work was complete.|3. The Vexis Howlers were well-equiped with transports, powered armor, and even logistical support - everything a fledgling outpost needed to survive.

Name: Functioning Base
Rules Text: You may gain 1 commodity, or you may spend 1 trade good or 1 commodity to draw 1 action card.
Flavour Text: 1. The Imperial Survey Corp outpost had been abandoned since the Twilight Wars, but the facilities had been built to last for millennia.|2. The local defense forces abandoned their fortress as the first troop transports made planetfall, leaving it open to occupation.|3. The orbital distribution station proved easy to integrate into the fleet's growing logistical operation.|4. "Yes commander, the base appears completely abandoned. No sign of what happened to the garrison."

Name: Gamma Relay
Rules Text: Place a gamma wormhole token in this system. Then, purge this card.
Flavour Text: Old spacers would tell stories of a black gateway in the deep space beyond the outer Oort Cloud.

Name: Gamma Wormhole
Rules Text: Place a gamma wormhole token in this system. Then, purge this card.
Flavour Text: The gravic sensors howled a warning. Ahead of the ship was a ring of twisted starlight, surrounding a sphere of utter darkness.

Name: Hazardous Relic Fragment
Rules Text: Action: Purge 3 of your hazardous relic fragments to gain 1 relic.
Aliases: hazardous fragment, red fragment, red relic fragment

Name: Industrial Relic Fragment
Rules Text: Action: Purge 3 of your industrial relic fragments to gain 1 relic.
Aliases: industrial fragment, green fragment, green relic fragment

Name: Ion Storm
Rules Text: Place the ion storm token in this system with either side faceup. Then, place this card in the common play area.|At the end of the "Move Ships" or "Retreat" substep of a tactical action during which 1 or more of your ships use the ion storm wormhole, flip the ion storm token to its opposing side.

Name: Lazax Survivors
Rules Text: Attach: This planet's resource value is increased by 1 and its influence value is increased by 2.

Name: Local Fabricators
Rules Text: You may gain 1 commodity, or you may spend 1 trade good or 1 commodity to place 1 mech from your reinforcements on this planet.
Flavour Text: 1. Edict 281: All indigenous production facilities are placed under control of the occupational authorities until further notice.| 2. "These people's autofactories can turn out a new starfighter in less time than it takes me to order it!"|3. Through sub-standard, the locally produced munitions were enough to turn the tide of the war.|4. Within months, bulk transports were arriving from the homeworld, reviving the local economy.

Name: Lost Crew
Rules Text: Draw 2 action cards.
Flavour Text: 1. "Mayday, mayday..this is the free trader Hrothgar...losing pressure fast...abandoning ship...Mayday..."|2. Only two survivors were found aboard the derelict, and they had a harrowing tale to tell their saviors.

Name: Mercenary Outfit
Rules Text: You may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on this planet.
Flavour Text: 1. "My mates and I used to be 4th Air Legion, but we figured we could make more money working freelance."|2. "Morse's Marauders are the most affordable soldiers of fortune on-planet. And trust me, you get exactly what you pay for."|3. The bar was full of scarred and dirty individuals from a dozen different species. But each one had a weapon, and looked completely comfortable with it.

Name: Merchant Station
Rules Text: You may replenish your commodities, or you may convert your commodities to trade goods.
Flavour Text: 1. The deep space freeports tend to be infamous dens of criminals, but also valuable nodes in the interplanetary trade networks.|2. "Unidentified vessel, this if Freeport Canopus. State your intentions before approaching."

Name: Mining World
Rules Text: Attach: This planet's resource value is increased by 2.

Name: Mirage
Rules Text: Place the Mirage planet token in this system.|Gain the Mirage planet card and ready it.|Then, purge this card.
Flavour Text: The star wasn't supposed to have a habitable planet, but one lay directly in the cruiser's path. And a cloud of starfighters was rising from the world's surface to greet it.

Name: Paradise World
Rules Text: Attach: This planet's influence value is increased by 2.

Name: Propulsion Research Facility
Rules Text: Attach: This planet has a blue technology specialty; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.

Name: Rich World
Rules Text: Attach: This planet's resource value is increased by 1.

Name: Tomb of Emphidia
Rules Text: Attach: This planet's influence value is increased by 1.|If the player who has the "Crown of Emphidia" relic has control of this planet, they can use that relic to gain 1 VP.

Name: Unknown Relic Fragment
Rules Text: The card counts as a relic fragment of any type.
Aliases: wild fragment, grey fragment, grey relic fragment, gray fragment, gray relic fragment

Name: Volatile Fuel Source
Rules Text: If you have at least 1 mech on this planet, or if you remove 1 infantry from this planet, gain 1 command token.
Flavour Text: 1. It turned out that the continuous lightning storms were an unlimited source of power, which was little consolation to those assigned to build the collection towers.|2. Only by using retrofitted Scavenger walkers could they mine the radioactive Nyx crystals safely.|3. "WIth the extra fuel refined from the plasma clouds, our fleet can continue operations for months."

Name: Warfare Research Facility
Rules Text: Attach: This planet has a red technology specialty; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.
